categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Around 3642 BBY, during the Cold War, the Sith Empire orchestrated an attack on the Rift Alliance's Attis Station on the planet Quesh. The attack was repelled by the Barsen'thor of the Jedi Order, assisted by Nadia Grell of the Rift Alliance.
